result.html: Is maith liom bheith ag garraíodóireachtI like to garden.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom ḃeiṫ ag garraíodóireaċtI like to garden.

result.eng: It was obvious from her face that she had been crying.
result.ga: Bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadh
result.orig: Bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadh
result.html: Bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadhIt was obvious from her face that she had been crying.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé soiléir óna dreaċ go raiḃ sí tar éis a ḃeiṫ ag caoineaḋIt was obvious from her face that she had been crying.

result.eng: I find my being Irish no cause for shame.
result.ga: Ní údar náire domsa a bheith i m'Éireannach
result.orig: Ní údar náire domsa a bheith i m'Éireannach
result.html: Ní údar náire domsa a bheith i m'ÉireannachI find my being Irish no cause for shame.
result.ponchtml: Ní údar náire domsa a ḃeiṫ i m'ÉireannaċI find my being Irish no cause for shame.

result.eng: What is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rud
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rud
result.html: Tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rudWhat is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua ag an scéal naċ féidir ḃeiṫ cinnte faoi aon rudWhat is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.

result.eng: It's bad of people to expect praise.
result.ga: Is olc an mhaise do dhaoine a bheith ag súil le moladh
result.orig: Is olc an mhaise do dhaoine a bheith ag súil le moladh
result.html: Is olc an mhaise do dhaoine a bheith ag súil le moladhIt's bad of people to expect praise.
result.ponchtml: Is olc an ṁaise do ḋaoine a ḃeiṫ ag súil le molaḋIt's bad of people to expect praise.

result.eng: I thought it was silly of us to argue.
result.ga: Cheap mé gur sheafóideach an mhaise dúinn a bheith ag argóint
result.orig: Cheap mé gur sheafóideach an mhaise dúinn a bheith ag argóint
result.html: Cheap mé gur sheafóideach an mhaise dúinn a bheith ag argóintI thought it was silly of us to argue.
result.ponchtml: Ċeap mé gur ẛeafóideaċ an ṁaise dúinn a ḃeiṫ ag argóintI thought it was silly of us to argue.

result.eng: It was bad of us not be grateful to him.
result.ga: Ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch de
result.orig: Ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch de
result.html: Ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch deIt was bad of us not be grateful to him.
result.ponchtml: Ba dona an ṁaise dúinn gan a ḃeiṫ buíoċ deIt was bad of us not be grateful to him.

result.eng: In the dark world of espionage, you cannot be sure of anything.
result.ga: I saol dorcha na spiaireachta ní féidir bheith cinnte de rud ar bith
result.orig: I saol dorcha na spiaireachta ní féidir bheith cinnte de rud ar bith
result.html: I saol dorcha na spiaireachta ní féidir bheith cinnte de rud ar bithIn the dark world of espionage, you cannot be sure of anything.
result.ponchtml: I saol dorċa na spiaireaċta ní féidir ḃeiṫ cinnte de rud ar biṫIn the dark world of espionage, you cannot be sure of anything.

result.eng: We were supposed to have guests coming in from several other states in the United States.
result.ga: Bhí aíonna le bheith ag teacht isteach as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit Aontaithe
result.orig: Bhí aíonna le bheith ag teacht isteach as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit Aontaithe
result.html: Bhí aíonna le bheith ag teacht isteach as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit AontaitheWe were supposed to have guests coming in from several other states in the United States.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí aíonna le ḃeiṫ ag teaċt isteaċ as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit AontaiṫeWe were supposed to have guests coming in from several other states in the United States.

result.eng: Of course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ga: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.orig: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.html: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ponchtml: Ar ndóiġ ḃí cuid acu ċoṁ leaṁ le ḃeiṫ ag aṁarc ar ṁúscán gorm ag fás ar ṗíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.

result.eng: In that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.
result.ga: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blag
result.orig: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blag
result.html: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blagIn that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.
result.ponchtml: Sa ċoṁṫéacs sin b'ḟéidir nárḃ ḟiú an trioblóid le ḃeiṫ ag scríoḃ blagIn that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.

result.eng: The relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
result.ga: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochta
result.orig: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochta
result.html: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochtaThe relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
result.ponchtml: Tugann scaoilteaċt an idirlín ardán d'aċan ċineál cancráin a ḃeiṫ ag caiṫeaṁ anuas ar ḋaoine eile faoi sciaṫ na ganḟiosaíoċtaThe relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.

result.eng: There'd be no point for you or me talking to them.
result.ga: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leo
result.orig: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leo
result.html: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leoThere'd be no point for you or me talking to them.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃeaḋ gar doṁsa nó duitse a ḃeiṫ ag caint leoThere'd be no point for you or me talking to them.

result.eng: I'd like to be a priest when I grow up.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom bheith i mo shagart nuair a thiocfadh ann domh
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom bheith i mo shagart nuair a thiocfadh ann domh
result.html: Ba mhaith liom bheith i mo shagart nuair a thiocfadh ann domhI'd like to be a priest when I grow up.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom ḃeiṫ i mo ẛagart nuair a ṫiocfaḋ ann doṁI'd like to be a priest when I grow up.

result.eng: Instead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ga: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.orig: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.html: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ponchtml: In áit a ḃeiṫ ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleaḋ cibé a ḃí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.

result.eng: You could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ga: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.orig: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.html: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ċoṁ maiṫ a ḃeiṫ ag caint leis an ġealaċ le a ḃeiṫ ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.

result.eng: It's a little early for someone like you to be interested in playing cards.
result.ga: Tá sé buille luath ag do mhacasamhail a bheith tógtha le himirt chardaí
result.orig: Tá sé buille luath ag do mhacasamhail a bheith tógtha le himirt chardaí
result.html: Tá sé buille luath ag do mhacasamhail a bheith tógtha le himirt chardaíIt's a little early for someone like you to be interested in playing cards.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé buille luaṫ ag do ṁacasaṁail a ḃeiṫ tógṫa le himirt ċardaíIt's a little early for someone like you to be interested in playing cards.

result.eng: She was growing up to be a girl.
result.ga: Bhí sí ag teannadh aníos ar a bheith ina cailín
result.orig: Bhí sí ag teannadh aníos ar a bheith ina cailín
result.html: Bhí sí ag teannadh aníos ar a bheith ina cailínShe was growing up to be a girl.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí ag teannaḋ aníos ar a ḃeiṫ ina cailínShe was growing up to be a girl.

result.eng: There is nothing to be gained from being rebellious to people you depend on.
result.ga: Níl dada le gnóthú ar a bheith easumhal don té a bhfuil tú ina mhuinín
result.orig: Níl dada le gnóthú ar a bheith easumhal don té a bhfuil tú ina mhuinín
result.html: Níl dada le gnóthú ar a bheith easumhal don té a bhfuil tú ina mhuinínThere is nothing to be gained from being rebellious to people you depend on.
result.ponchtml: Níl dada le gnóṫú ar a ḃeiṫ easuṁal don té a ḃfuil tú ina ṁuinínThere is nothing to be gained from being rebellious to people you depend on.

result.eng: You should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ga: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.orig: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.html: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċóir duit ḃeiṫ ag caint le do ṁacasaṁail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.

result.eng: I guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.
result.ga: Is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoile
result.orig: Is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoile
result.html: Is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoileI guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.
result.ponchtml: Is cosúil go ḃfuil sé de ḃuaiḋ orṫu a ḃeiṫ tugṫa don ġloine mar ṁáistrí scoileI guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.

result.eng: All you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.
result.ga: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sásta
result.orig: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sásta
result.html: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sástaAll you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma duitse aċ an tseanlánúin a ḃeiṫ sástaAll you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.

result.eng: It was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ga: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.orig: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.html: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ponchtml: Ba doilig ḃeiṫ ina gcuideaċta gan a ḃeiṫ mar ḋuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.

result.eng: You think it's strange for me to talk like that.
result.ga: Síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a bheith iontach ag mo leithéidse
result.orig: Síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a bheith iontach ag mo leithéidse
result.html: Síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a bheith iontach ag mo leithéidseYou think it's strange for me to talk like that.
result.ponchtml: Síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a ḃeiṫ iontaċ ag mo leiṫéidseYou think it's strange for me to talk like that.

result.eng: It's a good thing the poor man isn't in.
result.ga: Is mór an gar gan an duine bocht a bheith istigh
result.orig: Is mór an gar gan an duine bocht a bheith istigh
result.html: Is mór an gar gan an duine bocht a bheith istighIt's a good thing the poor man isn't in.
result.ponchtml: Is mór an gar gan an duine boċt a ḃeiṫ istiġIt's a good thing the poor man isn't in.

result.eng: There's no point saying anything.
result.ga: Níl gar a bheith ag caint
result.orig: Níl gar a bheith ag caint
result.html: Níl gar a bheith ag caintThere's no point saying anything.
result.ponchtml: Níl gar a ḃeiṫ ag caintThere's no point saying anything.
